profile:
For over 20 years , ex-scape has tackled the unique challenges posed when excavating in Toronto amd the GT A .  Over this time, we have developed an efficient strategy,  by combining decades of experience operating compact equipment and the ability to produce the right size machine for the job .

Christian Bustos , owner and main machine operator at ex-scape, has been working in construction since 1997. After graduating from construction fundamentals at seneca college, christian founded ex-scape in 1999.
services:
Compact Excavation, Underpinning Shoring, Waterproofing
Other Services:
OTHER SERVICES:
Residential grading.
Trenching.
Backfilling.
French drains.
Driveway.
Excavation/prep.
Landscape prep.
Top soil/sod.
Concrete demolition & disposal.
Concrete septic tank removal.
specialities: Unlike other excavation companies who primarily demolish and excavate for new builds , we only focus on small-to-medium size excavations  (additions , porches , walkouts , garages , etc ) Since we mostly servce toronto proper , we are constantly finding new ways to safetly and efficiently complete excavations despite challenging tight spots and logistical isseues.
